The [ggplot2 package ](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/ggplot2/ggplot2.pdf) is the probably the most widely used package for producing elegant visualizations in r. There are extensive resources available online from the creators of ggplot2. [R for Data Science](http://r4ds.had.co.nz/index.html) is a thorough, easy-to-digest text for those becoming aquainted with data visualizations in r. 

<br/>

##Visualizing Data with ggplot2

<br/>

###Install ggplot2()
```{r, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("ggplot2")
```

<br/>

###Load the ggplot2() package
```{r, echo=TRUE}
library(ggplot2)
```


#References


H. Wickham. ggplot2: Elegant Graphics for Data Analysis. Springer-Verlag New York, 2009.
